description: Mapping of SPIRES abbreviations for URLs to Displayable names
name: WEBLINKS

description: A dynamic KB which searches all 119a fields in the experiments collection, and returns those records' corresponding 119a fields.
name: ExperimentsCollection

description: Contains translation of PACS to a readable form
name: PACS

description: A list of 088 report-number prefixes for which the 980-collection 'NOTE' should be appended.
name: NOTE_COLLECTIONS

description: Mapping of journal abbreviations to full names
name: JOURNALS

description: A dynamic KB which searches all 371a and 110u fields in the institutions collection, and returns those records' corresponding 110u fields.
name: InstitutionsCollection
